body: Hi Rafat, I leave the 3rd one to Chris. For the second one do they have the material specifications? You should be able to use Radiance's translucent material and EP's Honeybee_EnergyPlus Glass Material to generate them. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/EFRV*I*wRwLx299k*WhhM5cfQoS5hMCGp7qe1ThCH*tLNsKQCgWqica2GRTfU9MM5aYR80I7sb1i5jUFdLg2B862i4K7hPZE/materials.png)
